main event: An individual reported observing a strange aircraft from their bedroom window in New Kensington, Pennsylvania on May 21, 1950.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 11:53 PM EDT on a clear night., The aircraft was described as round and flat with three or four large, brilliant lights., The lights on the aircraft appeared to rotate from left to right during flight., The individual estimated the altitude of the aircraft to be around 20,000 feet., There were several other flying saucer incidents reported in the area the week prior.
witness description: An unnamed individual observing from their bedroom window.
